Package org.jboss.windup.reporting.service

Class InlineHintService

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jboss.windup.graph.service.GraphService<InlineHintModel>
      • org.jboss.windup.reporting.service.InlineHintService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Service<InlineHintModel>
    public class InlineHintService
extends GraphService<InlineHintModel>
    This provides helper functions for finding and creating InlineHintModel instances within the graph.
    Author:
    Jesse Sightler

      Returns the total incidents in all of the InlineHintModels associated with the files in this project by severity.

      • getHintsForProject

        public Iterable<InlineHintModel> getHintsForProject​(ProjectModel projectModel,
                                                    boolean recursive)
        Returns all hints for the given ProjectModel. If recursive is set, then this will recurse into child projects as well.

      • getHintsForProjects

        public Iterable<InlineHintModel> getHintsForProjects​(List<ProjectModel> projectModels)

      • getMigrationEffortByPoints

        public Map<Integer,​Integer> getMigrationEffortByPoints​(ProjectModelTraversal traversal,
                                                             Set<String> includeTags,
                                                             Set<String> excludeTags,
                                                             Set<String> issueCategoryIDs,
                                                             boolean recursive,
                                                             boolean includeZero)

        Returns the total effort points in all of the InlineHintModels associated with the FileModel instances in the given ProjectModelTraversal.

        If set to recursive, then also include the effort points from child projects.

        The result is a Map, the key contains the effort level and the value contains the number of incidents.

      • getMigrationEffortBySeverity

        public Map<IssueCategoryModel,​Integer> getMigrationEffortBySeverity​(GraphRewrite event,
                                                                          ProjectModelTraversal traversal,
                                                                          Set<String> includeTags,
                                                                          Set<String> excludeTags,
                                                                          Set<String> issueCategoryIDs,
                                                                          boolean recursive)
        Returns the total incidents in all of the InlineHintModels associated with the files in this project by severity.
